title: main page
main-text: Explore our research on daily moral decisions and participate in our immersive scenario simulation. Start the simulation or skip to proceed directly to our Website.Please be aware that these scenarios are designed for research purposes at the Australian National University.
game-text: You (on the thinner side) and your friend (on the heavier side) are sitting at a table in a cafe, enjoying your lunch together. Your friend notices that you're trying to throw away the rest of the sandwich:
